Open-source game creator: no programming: Open-source game creator: no programming or coding is required! Make HTML5 and natives games. Quickly build and share your games on mobile (Android and iOS) and on the web.

GDevelop is an <span class=\"foss\">open: GDevelop je otvoren izvor, cross-platforma program za izradu igrice namijenjen za upotrebu svima - bez potreba programerskih vjestina
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Što čini GDevelop jedinstven i tako jednostavan za korištenje su događaji. Događaji su moćan način izraziti logiku igre, bez potrebe za učenjem programskih jezika.
Events are composed of conditions, on th: Događaji se sastoje od uvjeta, na lijevo i postupke koji su pokrenuti kada se ispune uvjeti
When Space is pressed, the character ani: Pritiskom prostor karakter animacija i zvuk su Pokrenuti. Ako bomba dotakne karakter, oni su oboje uništeni.
Create HTML5, mobile and native games: Create HTML5, mobile and native games
GDevelop's flexible architecture allows: GDevelop's flexible architecture allows you to choose if you want to create an HTML5 game that can be played on the web and exported to iOS and Android, or a native game for your operating system. You can also activate both platforms and export your game everywhere!

GDevelop's features are provided thanks: GDevelop's features are provided thanks to extensions, allowing you to embed just what you need into your game. Here is a short list of what you get when using GD!
Draw your own shape on screen with the S: Nacrtajte vlastiti oblik na ekranu sa oblikom slike
Make RPG-like maps with the Tiled map ob: Napravi slicnu RPG mapu sa poplocnim map objektima
- Add realistic behavior to your objects: - Add realistic behavior to your objects
Allow your objects to avoid obstacles wh: Allow your objects to avoid obstacles while moving
- quickly make your objects draggable wi: Brzo napravi tvoj objekt pomicajucim sa klikom miša
And more, to automate current tasks and: I vise za automatizaciju trenutnih zadataka i ponasanja u nekoliko klikova!
The scene editor lets you visually edit: The scene editor lets you visually edit your levels
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Create your levels dynamically with external layouts
Integrated debugger and performance prof: Integrirani program za pronalaženje pogrešaka i izvođenje profil
Save player data with HTML5 & native sto: Spremi igraceve podatke sa HTML5 & Izvornim Podacima
Full support for sound effects and music: Full support for sound effects and music
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Izgradi ambiciozne igre s naprednim značajkama
Communicate with external websites using: Komuniciraj sa vanjskom webstranicum koristeci HTTP zahtjeve
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipuliraj varijablama s arbitarnim složenem strukturom
These comments are sources of motivation: These comments are sources of motivation for us, developers of GDevelop. Do not hesitate to tell us what you think of GDevelop after trying it!
GDevelop is open source (even <a href=\": GDevelop je open source (čak i ova web stranica): svatko može doprinijeti i poboljšanje softvera! Igre se također temelji na robustan, slobodan i OpenBSD izvor tehnologija.
